description: Ministry of Urban Development, Water Supply and Drainage - Order to approve the immovable properties in Welikada, Sri Jayawardenapura Kotte, Colombo District for the constructions under ADB assisted Greater Colombo Water and Sewer Management Improvement Investment Project; in Alkupathakanda, Mullepihilla, Kandy Four Gravets D/S Division, Kandy District for the constructions under Kandy North - Pathadumbara Integrated Water Supply Project; in Uduwara and Wattepanguwa, Hali Ela D/S Division, Badulla District for the constructions under Badulla-Haliela-Ella Integrated Water Supply Scheme and in Kopiwatte, Thumpane D/S Division, Kandy District for the constructions under the Galagedara-Mawathagama Water Supply Project
